text: [Music]
hi guys I'm Laura Vitale on this episode
of Laura in the kitchen I'm gonna show

fries they are so so good and they go

chicken you name it there are a much

you can get started you need some

some chili powder some regular olive oil
salt and pepper and of course you need
potatoes now I'm just taking large
baking potatoes I've cut them in half
and then I've cut each half into
quarters so make them flat on up take up
on a table on a plate and pop them in
the microwave for 10 minutes and as you
can see when I take a knife it goes in
and out without any resistance because
they're pretty much cooked all the way
through and when you're grilling
something like a potato it would take
you forever to cook it all the way
through and it just wouldn't work so you
want to definitely cook them ahead of
time you can boil them if you want to
you can put them in the microwave like I
do for 10 minutes and done and the
reason why I prefer the microwave method
is because the potatoes come out really
dry which means they really adhere all
that anything can anything we can put on
them don't stick to it right away
because there's nothing there's no

run around it's gonna stick to the

not all of this is completely up to you
you can
